data.comment: Today's referee, Oliver Langford, has blown to start the match.
Ryan Leonard (Millwall) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 14, At The Den, Cafu has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Millwall's Mahlon Romeo has been booked in London.
Yuri Ribeiro is booked for the away team.
In the minute 28, Samba Sow (Nottingham) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
The first half has been concluded at The Den.
In the minute 48, Tom Bradshaw scores to make it 1-0 at The Den.
Goal! Alexander Mighten equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Sammy Ameobi (Nottingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Lewis Grabban with Lyle Taylor.
Troy Parrott is on a sub for Tom Bradshaw for Millwall.
The home team have replaced Mason Bennett with Matt Smith. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 74, Nottingham make their second substitution with Anthony Knockaert replacing Alexander Mighten.
Jiri Skalak is replacing Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson for the home team.
Oliver Langford blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Millwall make their fourth substitution with Ben Thompson replacing Shaun Williams.
Tyler Burey is on a sub for Jed Wallace for Millwall.
